# Preliminary work
### Installing Packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library("tidyverse")
library("knitr")
```
### Installing .csv file into R
```{r}
getwd()
all_police_shootings <- read.csv("data/fatal-police-shootings-data.csv")
```
# Basic Data Analysis
